uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.groups
Class GroupSummary

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.groups.GroupSummary
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>
public class GroupSummary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>

A data class containing information on groups. Basically just a map which will take a JSON object constructor. Protects you from having to deal with JSobjects directly.
